text:
Tree spawns @ {triangle}
Ranged + Heals stack @ {diamond} dodge spinners
Pull boss to {square}
Spread for Gaze #1
All stack at {square} Orb #1 - boss pulled to {diamond} after spawn
2x chains and Orb #2 @ {diamond} - boss pulled to  {star}
Spread for Gaze #2
Dodge spinners between {star} and {skull} (fear targets be careful)
2x chains and Orb #3 @ {star} - boss pulled near {skull}
Dodge spinners (majority of raid beyond skull near unmarked space)
All stack (except 1 tank) on {skull} for Gaze #3 suicide
Wait to release until called (release will be 1 sec before Orb #4 spawn to force spawn on tank that is up) !!! 45 secs of no special mechanics bang boss really hard here. 
Boss pulled near {cross}
Spread for Gaze #4 and 2x Chains (2secs apart)
Quickly stack @ {triangle} for Orb #5
Second Lust
Spread for Gaze #5 (any open space)
2x chains (do not break, heal through it)
Ignore Orb #6 ---> Boss must die before it completes
title: argus p3 notes
